website_summaries.verdict: This countertop ice maker produces ice very quickly and re-uses water from melted ice to make fresh ice.
pros: Makes 9 ice cubes in less than 10 minutes and as much as 26 pounds in 24 hours
Auto shut-off and warning lights for full basket, overflow, and low water
Re-uses melted ice to make new ice cubes
cons: Ice basket does not hold 26 pounds of ice, and sensor indicating basket is full can be accidentally triggered

customer_reviews.title: Great little machine!!
customer_reviews.text: Makes nice sized ice cubes fast and looks great! Only option I could wish for would be a pause button so it could keep cooling but not making ice. I should note that it is pretty well insulated and a full tray of ice left in it will last for many hours even with the machine not cooling anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Sev

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Let sit for 24 hrs per instructions; loaded drinking water into tank the next day; fired it up and it ran only one set of cubes thru then it stopped; shut everything down and restarted; it wouldn't work. I did this for several days and decided to return to manufacturer. As of this date - I still don't have a refund from the manufacturer on the item I returned. I just wasn't going to fool anymore with a defective machine.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl S. Abrams

customer_reviews.title: Comes BROKEN and not eligible for return replace.
customer_reviews.text: Box it came in is fine. Ice maker is broken. Not just plastic cracked, but bent metal and bottom is bulging out. Tried to replace return and I'm told not eligible. This sucks
customer_reviews.author: Larry B

customer_reviews.title: When it works, it’s awesome. But it doesn’t work very often.
customer_reviews.text: Works for a little bit, then stops. The lights indicate the ice bucket is full and the water is empty when just the opposite is true. I have to unplug it and plug it back in every few hours to get it working right again. So disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: TMB

customer_reviews.title: Constant problems
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a huge POS. It shows errors 2 times a week and constantly needs to be reset. However it always seems to happen when the basket is full and it melts all the ice and you have to wait for more. I would NEVER recommend this. Get the igloo maker!!
customer_reviews.author: Marcy and Eric Jones

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: In an RV freezer space is a premium. I was hesitant to purchase an ice maker because of the counter space, but I am so glad I purchased this. It is an amazing product. No more ice trays, remembering to purchase ice and then trying to chip away the ice frozen in the fridge to put it into the glass. I had the OXO ice trays, but even those were irritating to deal with. This item is perfect. Keeps the basket full of ice. It doesn't take long to refill. It dumps about every 7 to 10 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: raleelo

customer_reviews.title: Subpar ice. Barely frozen.
customer_reviews.text: Very unhappy. I read so many reviews and looked at so many options and felt confident until I plugged it in and it produces mushy, barely frozen ice. Had I known this wasn’t returnable I would never have ordered this. ** EDIT** I jumped the gun. The next few batches were fully formed and perfect. Running as much as I need and it’s been great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly Cool!!
customer_reviews.text: Ice cubes in under 8 minutes!! Absolutely love this amazing machine. Efficient, quick and quite. Why did I wait so long to get an ice maker. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: linda

customer_reviews.title: GOOD CONCEPT, POOR RESULTS
customer_reviews.text: Ice baby ice, I love that it makes ice so fast, I like the little high ball glass shape but it all goes down hill from there. First off, it is very loud, but that’s not the problem. Fill up your glass with ice, grab some refreshing coke from the refrigerator and and fill up the glass and put the coke back in the refrigerator, as you turn to quench your thirst, you notice all the ice has disappeared. This is what I’ve been dealing with, it melts in the blink of an eye. I believe it’s because with this size of machine, you can’t have speed and hard ice. I would of liked to love it.
customer_reviews.author: Tam Man

customer_reviews.title: I never knew I needed this, but I do!
customer_reviews.text: This is the device I never knew I needed. This thing really cranks out ice, AND it keeps it cold! It’s perfect for parties and I love that it can make a batch in under 10 minutes, (especially if you forget to fill up the trays in ge freezer!) I love it for making my own iced coffee at home. The device is pretty heavy, and you need to be careful keeping it upright because of the refrigerant fluid. It doesn’t take up a huge footprint on the counter, but you do need some space. It works so well though and it so handy, well worth the price! 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Watkins

customer_reviews.title: Fiji Water ICE!
customer_reviews.text: I love this because you can add the water you want! I’m a Fiji water fan girl so adding a warm bottle of Fiji water to the line and turn it on and within 5 min I have the cleanest best tasting ice known to man! I’m absolutely in love with this ice maker and have been using it every day for over a week! Do not hesitate! The ice is always fresh old ice melts down and makes new ice! So no block of ice and no gross “freezer taste” ever!
customer_reviews.author: Mesha

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says for the most part...
customer_reviews.text: Makes ice as described. Seems noisier than I thought it would be. I thought it would make ice quicker than it said it would. I even used refrigerated/cold water beforehand to help speed things up. I'd say it's good enough to keep up with a demand from 2 or 3 people only (in a basement bar environment) after waiting about 1 hour for it to produce enough ice for 3 people. Another big disappointment was that it was delivered in only the original box without any additional packaging around it like you typically see. Because of that I have a dent in the rear corner that I will be contacting the seller on.
customer_reviews.author: BenWieb

customer_reviews.title: Gets stuck and stops making ice, then it all melts.
customer_reviews.text: First few days I loved the thing. As time passed I started to grow annoyed with a few things about it. 1. The ice melts super fast in your drink. 2. It really doesn’t make a lot of ice. 3. On a daily bases I have to knock the ice down because it builds up over the edge and then all the ice will just melt and then there’s no ice if you don’t use it in a couple days. 4. Complaint number 3 is starting to happen more and more often to where I almost don’t have any ice when I want it. I keep having to reset it.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Chambers

customer_reviews.title: Buy another model.
customer_reviews.text: Wish I could return. It is the worse ice maker I have ever owned. You have to manually free up the ice several times a day to keep it working. It worth no stars.
customer_reviews.author: Bill E. Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent !!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've owned this machine for about six weeks now. I absolutely love it. I followed the direcrions and it works flawlessly. I personally use bottled water, never tap. I use gallons size Crystal Geyser water. I make sure the water is very cold when I fill the reservoir. I even add a handful of ice to the reservoir so it's very cold. I've made about 60lbs of ice with it. I run it for about 3-4 hours at a time. Definitely a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Gadget~

customer_reviews.title: Terrific little ice machine!
customer_reviews.text: I was utterly crestfallen when I moved into my new rental and realized the fridge doesn't have an ice maker. Every one of my drinks always has to have ice - I cannot live without it! I bought this little beauty based on the good reviews and agree with them completely. This machine makes ice quickly with no fuss. My only upkeep was to hit the "Ice" button once when I first bought it and now to refill the reservoir every few days when it gets low. The ice is hard but softens quickly for a more chewable ice as I drink my beverage. That's exactly what I wanted. I highly recommend this little machine!
customer_reviews.author: R. Bobbity

customer_reviews.title: Not Solid Ice
customer_reviews.text: I'm not thrilled with this product. It makes about 4 cups of ice at a time and the ice seems to be half melted when it makes. I can get up in the morning and fill the reservoir with water and it makes ice while I'm getting ready for work and I think I'll have ice when I come home, but not. I come home and half the ice that's been made is melted. When the ice makes, it seems half melted. I want to return it, but my husband says to give it a chance. It's been 3 days and I'm done, but we'll see.
customer_reviews.author: VRougeux

customer_reviews.title: Makes "wet" ice
customer_reviews.text: I wish I'd read the negative reviews before purchase because THIS IS NOT RETURNABLE. It makes ice, but it doesn't keep the ice cold enough to not start melting immediately. We bought this as a replacement for ice trays because the icemaker in our fridge went out, but because it makes "wet" ice, when you transfer the cubes to the freezer, they just freeze into one gigantic brick that isn't useful. You can't just leave it running because it runs CONSTANTLY and it's LOUD.
customer_reviews.author: Kait from MS

customer_reviews.title: Add water light comes on and refuses to make ice.
customer_reviews.text: Really liked this Vremi ice maker for the first few days. It worked great and was easy to use. Now, the "add water" light comes on, and even though I have done everything the instructions say to do, it will not make ice. Yes, I have wiped everything with a soft, dry cloth; I have made sure there is no extra light around the machine; I have drained and refilled it several times; unplugged it, let it rest for 2 days, then started over with everything, and still the red light comes on and no ice. help!
customer_reviews.author: CHARLES WHITE

customer_reviews.title: Ice at the push of a button!
customer_reviews.text: This ice maker is amazing! I used to make ice the old fashioned way, but now I am living in luxury! I can't wait to host a party. :) Things I love about it: -Very simple to use -Quiet -Attractive, sleek design -Compact size which makes it great for our small kitchen space! -I like the ice size and shape- it can fit into narrow water bottles!! -So fast!! Makes ice in less than 10 minutes. Just turn it on, go do something else and come back and it’s ready
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Fast ice maker.
customer_reviews.text: The product works. Makes ice faster then the fridge for extra need. About every 6 minutes or so. Product is not too loud and is more of a background noise. The machine couldn't be easier to operate. Dump water and go with minor cleaning. Keep in mind with refrigerated items like this, you do need to set them down to settle out the fluids when they arrive in the mail. Otherwise you may get a burnout issue. Also keep in mind the ice that is made is allowed to melt back into the reservoir. So the ice will be on the wattery side. So far though the machine has worked like a champ.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Only lasted 3 weeks
customer_reviews.text: I was so happy with this product while it was working. It is only week 3. We have followed all of the instructions and it quit making ice. I have contacted the seller and will update my review after seeing what the customer service is like.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wasn't the right machine for what I needed it for.
customer_reviews.text: This machine makes tiny, THIMBLE sized, hollow cubes, that melt quickly (because they are hollow). When I read that it makes 26 lbs in 24 hours, I thought it would be great for filling my beverage bin (an oval bucket that I place beverage bottles in when I entertain). NOT! This machine makes 13 TINY cubes every 9 - 15 minutes.... Not the right machine for what I needed it for, but could be fine for a few mixed drinks, etc., if you don't already have an ice maker in your fridge.
customer_reviews.author: Snowbird

customer_reviews.title: It'll Do Fine For What I Need
customer_reviews.text: I got this ice maker strictly for parties/company because our refrigerator ice maker can't keep up. I hate having to run out and grab a bag of ice constantly. It was easy to clean and set up. Yes, there is a bit of noise but I don't mind. The only complaint I have is that the ice is very wet. When you take it out of the bin, it is drippy. I transferred the cubes to the big bin in my freezer. Since the cubes were so wet, they got all stuck together and we had to use a heavy wooden spoon to break the cubes apart. But, we had ice and that's the important thing.
customer_reviews.author: La K

customer_reviews.title: Can I get an “Amen”?! Hallelujah!
customer_reviews.text: AWESOME! Can’t say enough about this magical wonder! Loved it so much my sister and mom bought one and we bought one for our daughter. All of us are chilled...oops, I meant “thrilled”! Ice keeps coming-so quickly. It is necessary to keep it filled with water (we need to do it once or twice a day) and I clear the full sensor by scooping the ice forward, freeing the sensor line of view whenever I walk by. The only downfall is it is a little loud, but sooo worth it! Easy set up-follow the instructions! The first few trays taste funny, but just dump them.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Awesome - for 2 months
customer_reviews.text: I literally just wrote the seller yesterday. We have had this since late July, so about 2 months. The refill water light has already stopped working. So we don’t know when it is out of water except that it makes tiny “cubes”. I’m thinking that may burn out the motor soon. Lame for a machine that is so new. I do have to say that before that my whole family was really enjoying this ice maker. We had a different one, but this one was way better, well until now. 😒
customer_reviews.author: K. Abbott

customer_reviews.title: Works well, Looks nice on my counter
customer_reviews.text: My ice maker quit working in my Kenmore fridge and they said it couldn't be fixed because they no longer have the part needed. So instead of spending $2K on a new fridge just for ice, I decided to give this a try. It's easy to use and makes ice pretty fast. I put it in big Ziploc bags and let if freeze before I put it directly into my ice maker (thanks to advice from another buyer that I read prior to purchase). Important to read the instructions and not leave water standing in it if not going to use for a few days.
customer_reviews.author: Jod

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised by how much and how quickly this pumps out ice. I use it camping. It's always a PITA to have to run get ice all the time. With this, i just start it up as soon as we get to camp and let it work. The basket is small and it fills quickly. I check it frequently and empty into a 2 gal Ziploc bag and before you know it, the bag is full. If you don't empty the bin, the ice will melt back into the reservoir and it'll make ice again. I really like mine. Glad i got it.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen Dover

customer_reviews.title: zGreat addition to the kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Makes lots of ice once it gets the water reservoir cooled down.. very quite and produced a medium size glass of ice every 5 to 6 minutes.. has basket that will hold about 5 to 6 glasses worth of ice.. using very cold water to fill speeds up first batch of ice. If plan on using it for large group, let it run several hours ahead and you will have almost constant flow of ice.. Very quiet operation as it is less noise than our Kcup coffee maker. Only a litter fan noise.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff R.

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: I ended up requesting a refund on this product. It didn’t keep the ice frozen, instead, the ice just melted and refilled the water reservoir and started the ice making process all over. This kept the machine going continuously and it’s not the quietest thing in the world. It would be fine if the ice was being consumed regularly like during a gathering; but if you want to just have fresh ice available all the time, I would NOT recommend this. It just kept reusing water and quite frankly I wouldn’t want to consume the ice used with stale water. Also, the ice tray never completely filled; maybe just 70%.
customer_reviews.author: Amazombie

customer_reviews.title: Nice ice machine.
customer_reviews.text: I like this ice maker. Two things I would change. I would put a water level indicator on the front showing exactly how much water is in it. You have to pull out the ice basket to see the actual level. If you do run out there is a light that comes on. The second item is the drain. It’s under the machine and requires you to lift it over the sink to drain it. They said you should clean it everyday. I’m at once a week on that.
customer_reviews.author: James W. Pyle III

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 1 week
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for a week, then started making a loud clicking sound even when shut off. Had to unplug it to make it stop. Tried letting it warm up and sound returned immediately after plugging in. Really liked it otherwise, could be mine was defective but I'm hesitant to get another from this brand.
customer_reviews.author: CatB

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Ice maker on our fridge stopped working so figured would by cheaper fix to buy counter top/ portable ice maker. Bought the vremi countertop ice maker based on couple factors. Looks, time it takes to make ice, size of ice cubes/they fit in a plastic water bottle, and ease of cleaning. This ice maker marked the boxes. Sometimes can make little noise maybe it's the fan but seems to stop after it warms up not a real complaint.
customer_reviews.author: jeremiah clark

customer_reviews.title: Works Like it Should But.....
customer_reviews.text: I bought this ice maker. It does do a good job of making ice but because it is not a freezer the ice starts melting as soon as it is dropped into the basket. I combat this by attending to this and getting the ice to the freezer right away. It works well and is designed well. I like the glass lid enabling the level of ice in the basket. I deducted one star because it does make “wet” ice. Have a towel handy to put under the basket to catch drips. Once in the freezer it is necessary to break apart clumped frozen ice in the storage bin. All in all it works as it’s supposed to.
customer_reviews.author: Brad and Cheryl Bloom

customer_reviews.title: Incredible product as always!!
customer_reviews.text: I'd like to say first and foremost that I have been purchasing Vremi products for some time now and the quality is superb!! The Vremi Countertop Ice Maker is of phenomenal quality. This makes "bullet" shaped ice cubes, hollow but still with thickness. It takes less than 10 minutes to get the first batch of ice into the tray and not long before the tray is full of these awesome bullet cubes!! What I love most about my Vremi Countertop Ice Maker is that it's fast. I'm able to cool down my drinks within minutes. Thank you Vremi!!
customer_reviews.author: VictoriaB

customer_reviews.title: Makes ice very fast! Very satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this little ice maker - it's perfect for my office, and when I want ice I just add water, wait a few minutes. That's it! It's a little noisy when in ice-making mode, but that's not for very long. And when I want to leave, I take out the remaining ice, drain out the water from below, and that's it. I keep in on the edge of the table behind my desk, that way all I do is pull out the plug on the bottom and place a container below. I also put a sticky note on the edge of the top opening to remember to replace the plug on the bottom before filling!
customer_reviews.author: Bake Woman

customer_reviews.title: Worked for six weeks....
customer_reviews.text: That was some expensive ice. The machine worked great for six weeks and then something went wrong. The part of the cycle where the ice is supposed to release doesn't work any longer, and so eventually we end up with a giant block of ice jammed all around the ice rods. Beware there is no way to return this item, either. There is actually a no return policy, so I spent $120 to get ice for six weeks.
customer_reviews.author: jillatoz

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work well and can’t return.
customer_reviews.text: The ice backs up and reads full too easily. Bucket isn’t even half full. Takes too long to make the ice compared to others I’ve had. Amazon doesn’t allow you to return it because of “gases”, so be sure to read all of the reviews; the negative ones are correct. I’ll just give it away and get the one I bought last, but non of them of this type, in my experience and I’ve had several, last more than 8 months or so.
customer_reviews.author: kat

customer_reviews.title: Spend the extra $50 for the competitor's ice maker
customer_reviews.text: Uodate: It no longer makes ice. It constantly says "ice full," but there is no ice, at all...or it says "ice," and it sounds like ice should be being made but nothing! Don't waste your money...what company's product lasts about a month and a half?! Hubby loves I've in all his drinks. We don't have an ice maker/water dispenser in our freezer/fridge. I was tired of buying bags of ice taking up valuable space in the freezer. Bought this. Not impressed. I should have spent an extra $50 for the other one. Stinks I can't return it.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 8

customer_reviews.title: Good looking product with poor performance
customer_reviews.text: This ice maker was purchased for our bar to have a cubes ice for a drinks and cocktails when needed. The design in terms of look is ok. The operation is easy and straightforward. However, we were disappointment with very little amount of ice produced per cycle, which was barely sufficient for one drink, and time it took to make it. The idea of making more ice prior to the party didn’t really work because this ice maker is not designed to keep ice for long time. The item is not returnable due to consisting of hazard materials in the product but the refund was issued to our satisfaction.
customer_reviews.author: Leon Sheiman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for camping!
customer_reviews.text: So far I love this ice maker, it's perfect for my camper and as a replacement for my fridge ice maker that went down. It's a little louder with the fan going so I turn it off at night. It makes ice fast, so you don't really have to wait too long. It recycles the water. It doesn't keep it frozen so ice melts and water goes back into the bucket to make more. You can't freeze it for later use because it doesn't keep it cold it will start to melt and then once put in freezer as a back up it all freezes together into a brick. But otherwise I'm really pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel H

customer_reviews.title: Lasted just over a year
customer_reviews.text: We have had this unit for just over 1 year, before it died. Constant issues of ice being stuck to top tray making the sensor think its full of ice when in reality it is all melted. The ice Machine is extremely loud and very hard to keep clean. Every few weeks I have to wipe it down and clean off the growth from inside the reservoir. I emailed the company and they only have a limited 1 year warranty. All they said was unplug it and wait several hours. After doing this and cleaning everything it still will not produce any ice. Buy something more reliable and that will last longer then 1 year.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Item
customer_reviews.text: Been using this for a few weeks now, no leaks, no issues yet. First batch of ice was not thick or solid, but it tells you to discard the first 3 makes anyways, after that, fantastic!!! Use it daily and nothing jams, you just have to push the ice down as it fills or else sensor thinks its full but at that point you have a full bucket of ice to use already so no issue there!
customer_reviews.author: Aren H.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love this! I spend over 45 hours a week in my office and I find myself frequently going out to get a soda simply for the ice. We’re not supposed to have this kind of machine probably... At my office... But I unplug it After it’s made a switch last me through the day. This has saved so many trips out to get a soda it’s already paying for itself. It does make a little bit of noise but I don’t care because it’s 100° outside and my office doesn’t have a case and I would not use the scary “break room” freezer for any reason. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Karis

customer_reviews.title: It does what is says
customer_reviews.text: When we are having beverages it is great, even when it is off a light stays on, and it keeps us from getting in and out of our freezer, the fan in it is loud, but tolerable. It does not keep ice frozen, actually the ice melts in the bottom of the basket, it does go back into water reservoir, which is nice. On the better side of the machine, a ice machine for the freezer costs more, which we have, but the water here is not good for drinking. Yes I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Debra L. Ruth

customer_reviews.title: liquid ice
customer_reviews.text: I usually get Newair brand but bought this for the price and after reading the reviews on it. It is not quiet by any means, you know it’s on. I don’t mind the noise since i tuned it out. I gave it a one star because the ice melts as soon as it reached liquid, unless you are using those thermal containers that keep your water cold for xx hours, but if placed in regular glass, expect the ice to melt as soon as quickly when it hit the liquid...so drink fast..lol.
customer_reviews.author: vivian

customer_reviews.title: Great unit and value.
customer_reviews.text: Our new home came with Samsung Refrigerator, high end. Ice machine not working which is major problem in these units. Cost to replace $500 and 50% chance it will fail. This counter top unit is small, makes ice fast, easy to clean and inexpensive. Actually cost us nothing with points. Ice cubes are small and cloudy even with filtered water. Tasteless. Apparently when cubes are made quickly they are cloudy. However, very convenient. We keep it on counter to left of refrigerator. Have plastic container in freezer to place cubes. Great solution to our problem. Unit is also portable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great to have around
customer_reviews.text: I love this ice maker. I bought one for the office and loved it so much bought one for home - even though I have an ice maker in my refrigerator/freezer. It makes ice so quickly and it is what I call soft ice - in that it is easy to chew. It is very quiet and I love the way it recycles the water as the ice melts. It keeps up with our usage and is amazing how quickly it will make ice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quick machine.
customer_reviews.text: It really does make ice incredibly quickly!! The cubes are good size. Not to big or too small. The only thing we don’t like about it is you can’t store the ice in the machine. So, it makes the ice, drops it in the bin, then starts making more ice. The ice starts melting in the bin and recirculates into the machine. So once we hear the ice fall into the bin we remove it and put it in our freezer. We easily can fill up a 10lb. Bag in a day.
customer_reviews.author: D. Walker

customer_reviews.title: Very fast ice machine!
customer_reviews.text: This replaced another brand of ice maker that was slightly larger and very much slower before it stopped working. The Vremi, though has a smaller footprint on the kitchen counter which is a plus and it makes ice very quickly. We will be sticking with this brand in the future.
customer_reviews.author: JoeNSA

customer_reviews.title: Love this ice maker! Looks classy & lots of ice with efficiency!
customer_reviews.text: This turned out to be an ideal portable ice machine for my use. It’s high-quality looks great I can pick it up myself and it fits right in my little kitchenette. It makes just the right amount for what I need. I added a very reasonable four yesr policy to it and it was perfect. I have had a portable ice machine before and it was not nearly the convenience the nice clean look in the size is this one not nearly as efficient It was exactly as seller described it and it was delivered right on time.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Smith

customer_reviews.title: Second one was also junk
customer_reviews.text: This product sounded good but it made one good batch of ice then it quit. The company was quick to send another unit which arrived surprisingly quick but again, doesn't work. It makes the 9 cube batch of ice then the add water light comes on and puts it in standby mode. So, unless I want to babysit it while it makes ice, it will just stop. I tried resetting, making sure there is enough water, the sensors are clean, nothing seems to work. You can't return this so just be aware of that.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Shaffer

customer_reviews.title: Just found out product is not eligible for return so I’m stuck with this piece of junk !!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The ice is extremely thin and Harlow it melts or than two minutes to lose your drink you keep adding more rice and it seems to melt faster if only the product worked because it looks nice and works really fast filled up an entire ice bucket in the freezer in one hour didn’t stick together or melt didn’t have to chisel apart if you know what I mean but when I purchased it I was under the impression that you could leave the ice in it which is not the case you immediately have to remove it and put it in the freezer I think they might be sending it back
customer_reviews.author: Kristine Niemeyer

customer_reviews.title: Product Description should read "Disposable" - Won't last much longer than a year
customer_reviews.text: Well, it ran ok, stopped, then warranty over - thank you, drive through. Honestly, i think that was actually the one they replaced that also konked out in under a year. They're not giving me another one - so, i'm going to tell you this very plainly - don't waste your money on this poorly made garbage. They're planning in obsolescence to the point of quick failure if anything isn't perfect. It's a waste of environmental resources, and it's a waste of your money.
customer_reviews.author: DLove

customer_reviews.title: Wet Ice
customer_reviews.text: Not ever using one of these before I didn't realize that they are not refrigerated, and when the ice dumps out it is wet then melts back into the sump. So if you put them in a freezer to build up inventor, they freeze together and become one big chunk of ice. An Ice pick has to be used which is not what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Makes Ice
customer_reviews.text: Looks good on Counter, once going makes lots of Ice but a little noisy, little more than Fridge one that stopped working, but tolerable. Good see-through top, need to check water level in morning before starting. Be sure to turn off at night! I mistakenly left it on and awoke to strange noise's in the house and thought someone had broken in, No, just Ice Maker catching up after an overnight melt. I would buy again for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: The ice maker is quiet and fast. The "cubes" are atually hollow cylindars - great for rapid cooling but turn to water quickly. I docked 1 star because a small L-shaped screen keeps coming apart from the body of the unit. If it can be glued there safely, it would be good for the vendor to add such to the creative and light hearted instructions. Prospective buyrs should be aware that this small appliance cannot keep up with the demands of a large party; best to make ice a few days ahead and store in freezer.
customer_reviews.author: pap Beel

customer_reviews.title: Good enough for small useage
customer_reviews.text: It was what I was expecting. Easy to fill with water, easy to use and makes a lot of ice cubes in a short amount of time however the ice cubes are small and do melt really quick and whatever room temperature or even cold refrigerated liquids they go in and melt really fast as they do not last more than 5-10 minutes at the most in a 16 oz container filled with a liquid. It is noisy as well but not a concern for me. All said it works for me and it's better than my stinky ice cubes from my ice maker.
customer_reviews.author: Brian B.

customer_reviews.title: Noisy!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This machine is quite noisy and the ice melts in your drink almost immediately.. However it does make ice quickly .. definitely disappointed with the noise level. Wouldn’t buy again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Machine stops after little use!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I received this as a Fathers Day gift. Although it is loud when it’s running the ice it made is worth it. The biggest problem with it is, it just stopped working after not even a month of use. Very disappointed. Can’t get any help. I’ve tried everything the manual recommended. Where do I go from here? Please don’t rate this “top rated” from premature use. Now I’m stuck with a $200.00 gift that’s now a paperweight!
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Has saved us money on ice
customer_reviews.text: Works wonders for what we need. I am an ice addict and usually will not drink water or anything else without ice. This has more than paid for itself and is used every single day. It is loud, but not overbearing. It’s in the kitchen so it doesn’t really cause issues noise wise throughout the house. It puts out a good amount of ice which last a decent amount of time. For what it is and what we need, it works!
customer_reviews.author: rachel

customer_reviews.title: Fast and efficient ice maker 👍🏼
customer_reviews.text: I am addicted to ice super uncomfortable in France. 🤨 I love this ice machine. It makes thee cute small bullet looking pieces of ice. It’s fast and perfect for parties. I got it for my salon suite. It’s surprisingly quiet. Downside, the ice is hollow and melts quickly.
customer_reviews.author: posh

customer_reviews.title: Ended up requesting a return within a few days
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if I received a bad one, or if the videos that are posted aren't catching the sound, but this thing is ridiculously loud. My video may or may not be representative of all units, but the Amazon rep who assisted gave zero push back which makes me think this might be common for the unit. Sound aside, it makes ice and did so fairly quickly - it's just not something I can have sitting on my counter putting out this loud vibrating buzz every 6 or so minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Deven P.

customer_reviews.title: So disappointed, seriously regret this purchase
customer_reviews.text: This unit is not refrigerated well at all, the ice melts quickly and then the water is reused to make ice again. After a few times of doing this the ice tastes horrible and you have to clean the machine out, however this is difficult because the machine is bulky and heavy. You will not be able to use for 24 hours after receiving which was annoying, the directions say to let it sit to allow the refrigerant in it to settle. Also, the amount of noise this small machine makes is unreal.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Johnson

customer_reviews.title: No more bags of ice
customer_reviews.text: We got this because we have an older fridge/freezer in the shed...a.k.a man cave. It has the water/ice dispenser in the door but no water can be hooked up. We were buying bags of ice to put out there until we looked into this. It takes about 30-40 mins to fill up its little basket but that’s ok with us. I can usually fill the ice bucket in the freezer in about 2 1/2 hours. For us this works great.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: I don't typically write reviews but Vremi amazed me with their customer service recently. I purchased this item in 2018 and it worked great until this year. The add water light comes on and does not turn off. I tried multiple things and even contacted Vremi and followed their suggestions. When none of the suggestions worked to fix the problem, Vremi said they would send me a free replacement within 5 to 10 business days. I did not even need to send the broken one back. And to top it all off, the icemaker arrived in 2 business days! The new replacement icemaker works great! Thank you Vremi!
customer_reviews.author: dan flack

customer_reviews.title: Great ice maker for the home or office
customer_reviews.text: We got this ice maker for my husband’s work place. They needed something that didn’t take up a ton of room but could make ice quick enough for 7-8 people to use daily. This ice maker is a good choice. It is small enough to not take up much room. Light enough to move it around if you need. Fast enough to keep up with the needs of the small group of co-workers. Plus, the ice cubes are small enough for the office to fill their drink bottles with ice so that is very nice. No issues at all so everyone is very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Time For Lunch

customer_reviews.title: Nice little ice maker
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Small counter-top footprint Efficient: 2 liters of water = maybe 5-6 trays of ice (just got it, so not quite sure) Easy to use (just as well, see below) Cons: Quite noisy in operation, fan and mechanical (probably no more than others, it's not in a fridge enclosure don't forget) Ice cubes produced are actually quite small Instructions are not specific enough
customer_reviews.author: Jim K

customer_reviews.title: REALLY produces!
customer_reviews.text: We love this ice maker! Once it gets going it REALLY produces! NO MORE ICE CUBE TRAYS!!! We usually spend a few hours in the afternoon or evening making ice about once a week and filling 4 0r 5 gallon bags to put in the freezer. You can hear it dumping the ice, but hey, that is SO NOT a big deal compared to having ice cubes you didn't have to break out of the tray, refill, break out of the tray, refill, break out of the tray, refill...
customer_reviews.author: Denise Carrico

customer_reviews.title: Damaged product
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited to use this ice maker. I opened the box (that was in perfect condition) and found an ice maker that was extremely dented. I am beyond disappointed. Its unfortunate that I had to spend $150 for a damaged product.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Jerabek

customer_reviews.title: Good ice machine. Works perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Great product makes awesome ice. Some reviewers said the ice smells? No it doesn’t. You have to change the water every so often, the guide says daily, but we leave it in for about a week without any issues of smell. The caveat is that it must stay on, once you turn it off then the water will settle and will smell like a fridge. But if you’re turning it off make sure to drain out the water. It’s not hard.
customer_reviews.author: Mariam M.

customer_reviews.title: Waste money and time!  And no return!
customer_reviews.text: We had this more than a year, but we rarely use it because it wastes time and energy. It takes about 10-15 minutes to make only about 9 pieces of small hollow bullet shape ice. The machine has no keep cool or frozen function. That means you have to find place in your freezer to store the ice otherwise the ice will melt. It take at least 30 mins to make a 16oz cup of ice. The machine is noisy too. It’s not returnable! It’s better to buy a real freezer which is about the same price at Costco. Very regret to buy this bulky, pricy, noisy ice machine. Not worthy at all!
customer_reviews.author: Willie T

customer_reviews.title: This ice maker. Makes ice pretty quick.
customer_reviews.text: I have had this unit for two camping trips. It makes ice pretty quick. I don’t know how many pounds in a day it will do. I do know if you watch it and pull out ice from it’s basket. And keep refilling it. It will be making ice. For me. Each full basket filled a 32 ounce yeti cup with a little left over. That was my main goal. I did have extra ice for my cooler. I’m not disappointed with the unit. If problems arise. I’ll update this review.
customer_reviews.author: dreamer

customer_reviews.title: Great for 2 people or small gatherings.. very pleased!
customer_reviews.text: Had this for about 2 months now and we love it. It takes about 10-15 min per batch of cubes to be dispensed, so if you’re going to use it for a small gathering start it up about 1-2 hrs before you expect to need ice . Most of the time it’s just two of us using it for ice in drinks for the pool. So it keeps up with us just fine. The full ice and water empty features work great ! We also left it on overnight and still had ice the mixer morning, it was a little soft but still ice nonetheless. Very please with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ICE IN 8 MINUTES
customer_reviews.text: This is the first freestanding ice maker I have owned. Since ice is not being made inside a freezer it starts melting as soon as it is released into the basket. If you put it in a ice bucket it stays loose. If you make a bunch ahead of time and put in the freezer it will all stick together so it's better to bag it so you can bust it up when time to use. I would like it better if it had a beep alert when time to empty basket or refill with water.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: God product for the money. No plastic taste and quiet!
customer_reviews.text: So I decided on this one due to the price tag compared to others. We have had it for about five months now and it is SO easy to use. Doesn’t have that gross plastic taste and gives well constructed cubes every time. Definitely would recommend if you need your dollar to stretch. When this machine is on we don’t hardly hear it except when it drops ice in the container every ten minutes or so but even then it’s very subtle.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin V

customer_reviews.title: i can't stand syrupy drinks.
customer_reviews.text: i only waited 22 hours to start it up. just add water and turn it on. for the first 2 hours i was drinking coconut body armor lyte drinks non stop- as fast as the ice cubes could be made. it's the way i break an addiction- by over dosing on the fix. hopefully by winter i will use the ice to cut the sugar content of my drinks, or better just enjoy bottled chilled water. it's far better to have this device than a refrigerator that constantly wastes electricity.
customer_reviews.author: mr. john gaskins

customer_reviews.title: Pricey and loud-ish, but FAST ice
customer_reviews.text: Little noisy, and an expensive way to make ice. BUT, makes ice super fast - like 10 cubes every 8 min. Keeps up with a houseful of guests making mixed drinks where the cup is filled with ice for every refill. So much better than my $4900 fridge that makes 1 ice cube per day.
customer_reviews.author: Marc G.

customer_reviews.title: Cold ice in minutes!
customer_reviews.text: I am a full time RVer and didn't have an ice maker in my rig so I bought this. Let me just say that it has been running every day for the last couple months and it hasn't failed yet to make enough ice readily available. This thing is awesome! Only thing I could possibly say bad about it is that the ice catch could be positioned better so the ice doesn't say it is full when it isn't requiring the ice to be moved out of the sensors way to start the process again but that is so minor it doesn't bother me, still plenty if ice for a couple drinks. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Ice Maker When the One in the Freezer Stops
customer_reviews.text: We have been without ice for a while in our house. The ice machine in our freezer stopped working and we just weren't the kind of people that felt like filling an ice tray and making ice that way so we went without. We had an opportunity to purchase this little ice machine and it works great for our needs. It's nice to have good cool ice again. Be sure to run a few round of ice before using the ice though, because it does have that "NEW PLASTIC" taste if you don't. Otherwise 5 stars for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Great machine that’s easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve owned other portable ice makers that were extremely finicky. This machine has worked perfectly from day one. Just be sure to allow the unit to “rest” for 24 hrs after shipping to allow the refrigerant to settle. Ice production is very fast. One drawback of this machine is it only makes ice of one size. Other machines allow selection between small and large and large cubes
customer_reviews.author: W. Yester

customer_reviews.title: Best ice maker around!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this ice maker because we were wasting money buying bags of ice weekly. This ice maker makes ice fast and we can conveniently use our filtered water in the ice maker. Our pup loves the ice cubes as much as we do. When you shut it down, be sure to drain it and leave it open to air dry. This has helped with preventing mold from building up in the machine.
customer_reviews.author: R. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: A little disappointing
customer_reviews.text: It's not bad really. But the issue is that the ice tray empties the ice so close to the inner wall of the machine that it immediately stacks up and blocks the IR cutoff sensor long before the ice basket fills up. It might make a lot of ice if you empty it constantly but on its own it rarely has more than a cup or two of ice befoew it blocks itself.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Harcrow

customer_reviews.title: Vremi  Counter Top IceMaker
customer_reviews.text: We use the ice maker every day for cold drinks. The cubes are a nice size. I like the fact it doesn’t take up too much room. The cubes have no taste or smell which is a big plus. It is very easy to use as well. Just open top, put in water after removing the tray, put tray back in, close lid, put down lid and press button. In a few minutes you have ice cubes.
customer_reviews.author: joan jaques

customer_reviews.title: Deceptive Quantity Count
customer_reviews.text: The deceptive part about this ice maker is "the 26 pounds of ice per day..." It fails to mention that the quantity per batch fits in a one quart bag which requires SOMEONE to empty the container 45-50 times a day to make the 26 pounds of ice. I bought this so my work crew would not have to buy bagged ice every day for their IGLOO. This is not the best choice for that need and I cannot imagine anyone wanting to put this much weork into a personal ice maker...
customer_reviews.author: Gwyny

customer_reviews.title: Excellent ice maker! Make one cups worth or prepare for a party!
customer_reviews.text: Love this ice maker! If you want just a full glass, you can have that within 20-30 minutes - but it’s best to make more while you are at it. The first ice bullets (shaped like bullets) are less frozen because the machine is cooling in the beginning, so it makes colder ice as it works longer. Use a gallon or quart bag to freeze your ice, stop when you have what you want. Prepare for a party, or just for yourself. I love making frappes in my Ninja, so I am in heaven now!!! Thank you!!!
customer_reviews.author: melzhere

customer_reviews.title: Reviews are not accurate. Machine is a lemon!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this machine a year ago and at least twice a month it stops working. All the indicator lights come on and it stops making ice. Very frustrating. Would not recommend. Especially for family. I live alone and it gets light use. Don't know why it has high reviews. Go with an Igloo or brand name. Vremi must mean lemon in a foreign language.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected
customer_reviews.text: Appears to work as it should. Makes plenty of ice. Only noticable sound is the fresh batch of ice cubes dropping into the basket. Can startle you in a quiet house. I've cubes are wet, which makes them stick together in the freezer. I keep mine in 1 gallon Ziploc bags which are easy to drop on the counter to break cubes up. Happy with the product so far.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Jury still out.
customer_reviews.text: Positives: makes cubes quickly, small footprint, automatically turns off when the cube tray is full, and the melting cubes just feed water back to the reservoir. Negatives: cubes are small, somewhat fragile (porous), and melt quickly. Concerned that there is not enough insulation to keep the cubes from melting before they get used. We live in a hot environment and this is a major concern. All in all, we are satisfied with the purchase. We will probably go with the version that uses standard 5-gallon water jug if we ever need to replace the current machine.
customer_reviews.author: Joe D. Battin

customer_reviews.title: Love this ice machine!!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered This ice machine because our nice fridge has a small ice maker and doesn’t keep up on making enough ice for our family. I ordered It and it came right away in two days. I unpacked It and waited the 24hours it asks you to wait. Cleaned out the basket and the inside as directed and the next day started making ice! I threw out the first 2 batches and then from there is has been making ice ever since! It’s a nice quite machine I only Hear the ice drop in the basket. It works great! Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: Dotjoco

customer_reviews.title: If you chew ice pass this one, if you want ice, it's great!
customer_reviews.text: It makes the ice cubes just like it says but the cubes are not clear and don't have the crunch of commercial machines. I tried but this product just didn't work for this ice chewer.
customer_reviews.author: Cookie

customer_reviews.title: No surprises, just works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had unit about a week. Easy to use & cycles ice cubes every 9 minutes. 8 cubes per cycle. Fills basket in about 1 hour. Easy to add water. Stops when basket is full. Immediately restarts after removing basket as long as water level is ok. Noise level is pretty quiet & not a bother. I use filtered water from my Pur sink filter. Ice has clean fresh taste.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald G. Flowers

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware.....non returnable
customer_reviews.text: Arrived DOA. Would not make ice. Tried to cancel within 30 hours of receiving (need to wait 24hrs to run it) and site told me oit of return period. Amazon stood behind the sale and took care of it.
customer_reviews.author: chris m.

customer_reviews.title: Learning curve, I'll get this! Simple bin full solution. Use the scoop!
customer_reviews.text: Kicks out ice quick but cloudy. With research I found they all do that because of the air that occurs through the water flow, the only way to make clear ice is a very still pure water expensive project. One reviewer here had a problem of ice basket full to soon and has a simple answer, would love to know what the fix was! I use ice cold water to start to help speed up the freeze process. Liking it, learning to love it.
customer_reviews.author: James Costello

customer_reviews.title: Very solid icemaker, especially for the price
customer_reviews.text: I was very leery of a countertop icemaker, but after reading reviews, I decided to take a chance on this one. For the price, it's an absolute workhorse. It cranks out the ice very fast, and the ice is great. My wife recently needed a bunch of ice for a trip, and the first weekend of the machine she stockpiled the ice and had plenty left over. It's efficient and doesn't take up too much space. The compressor is a little noisy in spurts while it runs, but not any more so than other similar appliances. Strongly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Sal Cataldo

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't make clear ice
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for clear ice and it doesn't make that. I don't have room upstairs so need to run up and down to keep putting the pellets in the freezer as it doesn't keep them very cold after making them. You need to switch them over rather quickly. Sorry I spent the money. Ice trays do the same job, just not as fast.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Tatum

customer_reviews.title: Simple just plug and use
customer_reviews.text: It makes ice every 7 minutes works great i like that there is no drain hose needed as the ice melts the water is reused again. Great producr gone to puchase another one for out RV
customer_reviews.author: Matthew M. Hecht

customer_reviews.title: Good Tabletop Ice Maker
customer_reviews.text: I bought this ice maker for someone else. They have told me that it works really well. They say that the only issue is that the ice tends to clump up into a blob if left in the freezer overnight. Because of that I gave it a 4 star rating (otherwise it would get 5 stars). The best results are seen when just enough ice is made to get through the day. It isn't an issue for them though. It makes ice quickly and is much more convenient than lugging in big bags of ice from the store.
customer_reviews.author: da5267

customer_reviews.title: OK for our needs
customer_reviews.text: We bought this because the ice maker in our old Sub Zero has been acting up. We ran it the first day and got 5-6 baskets of ice to put in the freezer. It will fit our needs perfectly as an emergency back-up. It is not that noisy as some reviewers say, but the ice bullets are very “wet” and will cling together in your freezer.
customer_reviews.author: Lauberge49

customer_reviews.title: Makes ice quickly, gives you your freezer space back!
customer_reviews.text: It’s really nice to have a little box making ice when I’m home, without using up freezer space to hold ice all the time! Also no worries about other contents of freezer giving it surprise flavors! When it dumps the little bullet-cubes into the hopper, there will be noise. But that’s about it. If you shut it off, the ice melts back into the water supply for the next time you turn it on. Nifty!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Francis

product_meta.title: Vremi Countertop Ice Maker - Ice Cubes Ready in 9 Mins - Perfect for Water Bottles, Mixed Drinks - Portable Small Stainless Steel Ice Maker with Ice Scoop and Basket - Silver and Black
feature_bullets: DESIGNED TO MAKE PERFECT ICE FAST - Our ice maker works quickly making 9 chewable delicious bullet-shaped ice-cubes in one cycle in just 8 to 10 minutes—and up to 26 lbs of ice in 24 hrs Each ice cube weighs 8 grams making it perfect for mixed drinks or small water bottle openings

COMPACT, PORTABLE ICE MACHINE - Good things come in small packages. Measuring at 9. 5 x 12 x 13. 5 inches, this ice maker can go anywhere. Since it doesn’t need a water hookup, it’s an ideal choice for barbeques, outdoor parties, or basement bars. Get fresh ice in your ice adventures as this ice-maker comes with a 1. 5 lb removable ice bucket and a plastic scoop

INTELLIGENT FEATURES - You do enough thinking let us help out Our ice maker prevents overflowing with warning lights and an automatic shut-off feature for when the ice basket is full or if water needs to be refilled It doesn’t need any complex installation either just set it upright and leave it for 24 hours to settle its coolant before use

QUIET and ENERGY EFFICIENT - Electric ice maker is made to be chill it runs at a mellow and efficient 120 watts with a quiet cooling function Its 2 2-liter water reservoir sits below the ice basket letting your ice maker reuse water from melted ice to make new ice— giving you best-in-class ease-of-use and energy efficient

YOUR SATISFACTION IS OUR PRIORITY - Vremi offers a 1-year and free return or exchange within 30 days of order receipt. We want you to be completely satisfied with your purchase. If you experience any issues, please contact us or any of our authorized sellers directly, and we will do everything we can to make things right!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars2,187 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
